alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 11:38AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rockingham and southeastern Hillsborough Counties through 1215 PM EST... At 1137 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Manchester to Attleboro. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Derry, Hampton, Exeter, Kittery, Salem, Hooksett, Epping, Brentwood, Greenland, Raymond, Hudson, Pelham, Stratham, Newmarket, Rye, Londonderry, Hampstead, Atkinson, and Kingston. This includes the following highways... Interstate 293 near mile marker 1. Interstate 93 between mile markers 0 and 23. Interstate 95 in New Hampshire near mile marker 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
